part.content: PART II : PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO INSURERS Sec. 2C - 64.
PART IIA : INSURANCE ASSOCIATION OF INDIA, COUNCILS OF THE ASSOCIATION AND COMMITTEES THEREOF. Sec. 64A - 64T.
PART IIB : TARIFF ADVISORY COMMITTEE AND CONTROL OF TARIFF RATES Sec. 64U - 64UM.
PART IIC : SOLVENCY MAEGIN, ADVANCE PAYMENT OF PREMIUM AND RESTRICTIONS ON THE OPENING OF A NEW PLACE OF BUSINESS. Sec. 64V - 64VC.
PART IIIA : INSURANCE CO-OPERATIVE SOCIETIES. Sec. 94A.
PART IV : MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANIES AND CO-OPERATIVE LIFE INSURANCE SOCIETIES. Sec. 95 - 101.
